thread.title: Scott Disick Getting Cozy with Yet Another Woman Leads Today’s Star Sightings
thread.title_full: Scott Disick Getting Cozy with Yet Another Woman Leads Today’s Star Sightings

author: Celebuzz
title: Scott Disick Getting Cozy with Yet Another Woman Leads Today’s Star Sightings
text:
MORE >> 
Scott Disick can’t get enough of the ladies. Just a day after he was seen kissing a brunette model named J Lynne , the Keeping Up with the Kardashians star was seen canoodling with a blonde woman in Miami. 
Sharing a lounge chair by their hotel pool, the two were seen cuddling by the water as they hung out with friends. Clad in a bikini, the mystery woman was all-smiles as she rested her head on Disick’s bare chest. 30 Photos » 
Later, the two took their PDA to the beach as the laid in chaise lounges in the sand. 
“He was very affectionate with her and they were playing footsie and wrapping their legs around each other,” an onlooker told Us Weekly of Disick’s affection of his new lady. “He wasn’t trying to hide it at all.” 
Disick’s Miami getaway follows his Costa Rica vacation with ex-girlfriend Kourtney Kardashian and their three children.
